eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE for the following counties or areas: Boulder, CO; at 03:24 PM ON JAN 5, 2026 Effective until 04:24 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Emergency officials have issued an EVACUATION ORDER at 15:24:08 on 01-05-2026 due to Wildfire occurring in the area of Highway 287 & Dillon.  Click www.BOCO911Alert.org for a map of the affected area and detailed information.
